description: Describes active client connections and connections that have been terminated within the last 60 minutes for the specified Client VPN endpoint.

parameters.name: ClientVpnEndpointId
parameters.description: The ID of the Client VPN endpoint.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: One or more filters. Filter names and values are case-sensitive. connection-id - The ID of the connection. username - For Active Directory client authentication, the user name of the client who established the client connection. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as tags, attributes, or IDs. If you specify multiple filters, the filters are joined with an AND, and the request returns only results that match all of the specified filters. For more information, see List and filter using the CLI and API in the Amazon EC2 User Guide. Name (string) --- The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. Values (list) --- The filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. If you specify multiple values for a filter, the values are joined with an OR, and the request returns all results that match any of the specified values. (string) ---

nested_items.name: Connections
nested_items.description: Information about the active and terminated client connections.

nested_items.name: ClientVpnEndpointId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Client VPN endpoint to which the client is connected.

nested_items.name: ConnectionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the client connection.

nested_items.name: Username
nested_items.description: The username of the client who established the client connection. This information is only provided if Active Directory client authentication is used.

nested_items.name: ConnectionEstablishedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the client connection was established.

nested_items.name: IngressBytes
nested_items.description: The number of bytes sent by the client.

nested_items.name: EgressBytes
nested_items.description: The number of bytes received by the client.

nested_items.name: IngressPackets
nested_items.description: The number of packets sent by the client.

nested_items.name: EgressPackets
nested_items.description: The number of packets received by the client.

nested_items.name: ClientIp
nested_items.description: The IP address of the client.

nested_items.name: CommonName
nested_items.description: The common name associated with the client. This is either the name of the client certificate, or the Active Directory user name.

nested_items.name: Code
nested_items.description: The state of the client connection.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: A message about the status of the client connection, if applicable.

nested_items.name: ConnectionEndTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the client connection was terminated.

nested_items.name: PostureComplianceStatuses
nested_items.description: The statuses returned by the client connect handler for posture compliance, if applicable.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
